data.text: â€œAll you people who are in exile,
What you really need is to have a close relationship with me,
Listen to me and come to me;
By what he did, I showed my power to many people-groups;
And similarly, you will summon people of other nations to come to you,
Seek to know me while it is still possible for you to do that;
Wicked people should abandon their wicked behavior,
I, Yahweh, declare that what I think is not the same as what you think,
Just as the sky is far above the earth,
Rain and snow come down from the sky,
And similarly the things that I promise to do, I will always cause to happen;
